text.tspan: Human Capital Index in males vs. females, 2020
The Human Capital Index (HCI) combines indicators of health and education into a measure of the human capital
that a child born today can expect to obtain by their 18th birthday, on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
